id: Obsidian Bible Knowledge Management Starter Kit
name: Obsidian Bible Knowledge Management Starter Kit
description: Get a set of opinionated files and a video walkthrough to help you set up a Bible Knowledge Management System (or biblically connected thinking) in Obsidian. These files can be use for other note taking systems that use bi-directional links like Roam, Craft and Notion but they are designed for Obsidian.
